pull.title: ci: Force `ccache` package version for MSVC build
pull.body:
The recent update of the `ccache` [package](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/ccache) from 4.6.1 to [4.6.2](https://ccache.dev/releasenotes.html#_ccache_4_6_2) broke our MSVC CI build.

This PR forces the working version 4.6.1.

verification.payload:
tree 1fdd0feb5cd2479c799ef7db2ea1c0eb84d08b28
parent 1420547ec30a24fc82ba3ae5ac18374e8e5af5e5
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1661411530 +0100
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1661411530 +0100

ci: Force `ccache` package version for MSVC build

The ccache 4.6.2 is broken.

events.message:
ci: Force `ccache` package version for MSVC build

The ccache 4.6.2 is broken.

events.body: What about the point update actually broke things? Has it been reported upstream?

> What about the point update actually broke things? Has it been reported upstream?

Checking the https://github.com/ccache/ccache repository...

cc @sipsorcery

> > What about the point update actually broke things? Has it been reported upstream?
> 
> Checking the https://github.com/ccache/ccache repository...

`git log --oneline v4.6.1..v4.6.2` shows nothing suspicious...

@MarcoFalke 

As all caches (Qt, vcpkg tools, vcpkg binary, ccache) have been invalidated, a couple of minutes lacks to finish a build before timeout.

Do you mind increasing CPU number:
```diff
--- a/.cirrus.yml
+++ b/.cirrus.yml
@@ -97,8 +97,8 @@ task:
   name: "Win64 native [vs2022]"
   << : *FILTER_TEMPLATE
   windows_container:
-    cpu: 4
-    memory: 8G
+    cpu: 6
+    memory: 12G
     image: cirrusci/windowsservercore:visualstudio2022
   timeout_in: 120m
   env:
```
?

verification.payload:
tree 93f5a30ca6570255accaa65cea9da9ba4f3c007b
parent 905f6142e7665c24e666bbe34bec19d422efdafa
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1661421797 +0100
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1661421797 +0100

ci: Increase `windows_container` resources

Required to fit timeout when all build caches are invalidated.

events.message:
ci: Increase `windows_container` resources

Required to fit timeout when all build caches are invalidated.

events.body:
> What about the point update actually broke things? Has it been reported upstream?

It has been fixed in [v4.6.3](https://ccache.dev/releasenotes.html#_ccache_4_6_3) (tested in my Cirrus account).

> This PR forces the working version 4.6.1.

Nevertheless, I'd prefer to stick to well-known v4.6.1 for now.
